metadata.title: CVE-2016-9675 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: openjpeg: A heap-based buffer overflow flaw was found in the patch forCVE-2013-6045. A crafted j2k image could cause the application to crash, orpotentially execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
